title: Ashton Kutcher 'would kill' Mila Kunis if she joined the Real Housewives
text:
She's earned her rank among the Hollywood elite with a stellar career in film and television.

And while Mila Kunis admitted during an interview on A Grown-Up Woman podcast that she has interest in other endeavors, her husband Ashton Kutcher is not so keen on one particular idea.

The 36-year-old actress told comedian Andrea Savage that she's a huge fan of reality television and even had a notion to throw her hat into the realm.

Family matters: while Mila Kunis admitted during an interview on A Grown-Up Woman podcast that she has interest in other endeavors, her husband Ashton Kutcher is not so keen on one particular idea

'I did ask my husband once, I was like, listen,' she said. 'Later, in like 20 years, 30 years, what do you think of me going on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills? I'm like, just for like, a year.'

Mila seemed eager to dive into a new role, but her husband of almost five years was adamantly against the notion.

'He was like … I would kill you,' Mila joked.

'I did ask my husband once, I was like, listen,' she said. 'Later, in like 20 years, 30 years, what do you think of me going on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills? I'm like, just for like, a year'

Bleed blue! Mila and Ashton are big sports fans and are often seen cheering on the Dodgers at games in Los Angeles

Her affinity for the popular Bravo program went one step further when she played Make Love, Marry, Kill.

She decided to 'marry' Mauricio Umansky, 'make love' to Harry Hamlin and 'kill' Paul PK Kemsley.

When it came to the wives, Mila revealed she would 'marry' Kyle Richards, 'kill' Dorit Kemsley and 'have fun' with Lisa Rinna.

Andrea noted the couples were matched up in categories and asked why Kunis chose to 'kill' the Kemsleys.

Talk about it! When it came to the wives, Mila revealed she would 'marry' Kyle Richards, 'kill' Dorit Kemsley and 'have fun' with Lisa Rinna

Yes, please! During a game of Marry, Love, Kill, Mila decided to 'marry' Mauricio Umansky, 'make love' to Harry Hamlin and 'kill' Paul PK Kemsley

'They seem like a lovely couple, but like in this game … he's dead. But hopefully like a painless death,' the Bad Moms star said. 'Like, instant death. So no suffering.'

She added that Dorit 'seems very high maintenance and she would be really expensive to get married to.'

Mila had no problem marrying the Umansky-Richards duo and was even interested in being their 'third wheel.'

'Yeah, I'd be a third wheel with them. Like if they were like, 'come to dinner,' I'd be like, 'Cool!'' she said before admitting she flew on the same Southwest flight as the couple years ago. 'They were behind me, and I was like, 'oh my God, it's the people from this reality show!' I was so excited.'
description: The 36-year-old actress told comedian Andrea Savage that she's a huge fan of reality television and even had a notion to throw her hat into the realm.
